Docs.summary: Middleware to normalize mention Entities from channels that apply <at> markup tags since they don't conform to expected values. Bots that interact with Skype and/or teams should use this middleware if mentions are used.
Docs.description: This will * remove mentions if they mention the recipient (aka the bot) as that text can cause confusion with intent processing. * remove extra <at> markup tags on mentions and in the activity.text.
